## What results do you expect of the following commands?

```{r guess results, results = "hide", warning = FALSE, error=FALSE}
x <- c(2, 5, 6, 5)
y <- c(3, 5, 8)

?class
class(x)

x + 1
x + y

y[2:3]
x[x > 5]

x <- x[1:2]
length(x)

member <- c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE)
?sum
sum(member)
```
